original_title: ママのリアル性教育 君島みお
overview: She is so beautiful that everyone turns around when she walks in town, but she is not good at housework. For her son, who became enough to masturbate in her own sleeping position, Mio said, "Because it's only once, isn't it? This is also the role of a mom..." However, her son becomes even more obsessed with Mio after having a physical relationship with Mio. To her runaway son, Mio opens her own genitalia and inserts it into her son, saying, "I'm just a teacher...". Her son devoted himself to sex practice with the body of a beautiful, big-breasted and gentle mom.
title: Mom’s Real Sex Education – Mio Kimishima
